name: AR
tagline: AR is a simple way to talk to ActiveRecord based databases from Go (in progress)
body:
### AR is a library to make talking to Rails managed databases simple for Go programs
There are two parts to this library, the ar library, and the art tool.

The planned startup for it would be something akin to the following (when we're stable):

```
$ go get github.com/acsellers/ar
$ art convert
$ mv artmodels app/mymodels
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
